section.p: The water is so cold that it makes you groan like a dying man. A moment later you feel hands of mud and weed clutching at your ankles from the riverbed, and then you truly know the meaning of fear.

To cross safely you must cope not only with the strong current but also with the supernatural tendrils that are trying to pull you under.
Make a SCOUTING roll and
a MAGIC roll , both at a Difficulty of 14.
